widget.name: Event locator
widget.description: "Event Locator" is an application for mobile devices that lets you locate where an event is happening, and then find a route to return to it. This application is useful because it allows event organizer to notify their clients where they are situated. In addition, "Event Locator" will also save a log of your saved positions (up to 50), so that you can retrieve a location for future use. The list allows you to see the position on a map, and you can also delete one or more old locations.
widget.author: Davis Peter
